Read-only "cache" of custom properties of a room.
string Name [get]
The name of a room. Unique identifier for a room/match (per AppId + game-Version).
int PlayerCount [get]

bool IsVisible [get]
Defines if the room is listed in its lobby.
Detailed Description
A simplified room with just the info required to list and join, used for the room listing in the lobby.
The properties are not settable (IsOpen, MaxPlayers, etc).
This class resembles info about available rooms, as sent by the Master server's lobby. Consider all values as readonly. None are synced (only updated by events by server).

CustomProperties CustomPropertiesPhoton.Realtime.RoomInfo Photon.Realtime.RoomInfoCustomProperties
Hashtable Photon.Realtime.RoomInfo.CustomProperties[get]
Read-only "cache" of custom properties of a room.
Set via Room.SetCustomProperties (not available for RoomInfo class!).
All keys are string-typed and the values depend on the game/application.
Room.SetCustomProperties
Definition at line 77 of file RoomInfo.cs.
IsOpen IsOpenPhoton.Realtime.RoomInfo Photon.Realtime.RoomInfoIsOpen
bool Photon.Realtime.RoomInfo.IsOpen[get]
Defines if the room can be joined.
This does not affect listing in a lobby but joining the room will fail if not open. If not open, the room is excluded from random matchmaking. Due to racing conditions, found matches might become closed even while you join them. Simply re-connect to master and find another. Use property "IsVisible" to not list the room.
As part of RoomInfo this can't be set. As part of a Room (which the player joined), the setter will update the server and all clients.
Definition at line 127 of file RoomInfo.cs.
IsVisible IsVisiblePhoton.Realtime.RoomInfo Photon.Realtime.RoomInfoIsVisible
bool Photon.Realtime.RoomInfo.IsVisible[get]
Defines if the room is listed in its lobby.
Rooms can be created invisible, or changed to invisible. To change if a room can be joined, use property: open.
As part of RoomInfo this can't be set. As part of a Room (which the player joined), the setter will update the server and all clients.
Definition at line 144 of file RoomInfo.cs.
MaxPlayers MaxPlayersPhoton.Realtime.RoomInfo Photon.Realtime.RoomInfoMaxPlayers
byte Photon.Realtime.RoomInfo.MaxPlayers[get]
The limit of players for this room.
This property is shown in lobby, too. If the room is full (players count == maxplayers), joining this room will fail.
As part of RoomInfo this can't be set. As part of a Room (which the player joined), the setter will update the server and all clients.
